attributes.action: allow students, who attend Hartsdown Technology College-Sixth Form, to wear non-uniform.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hartsdown Technology College has allowed students for many years to come in and wear non-uniform clothes for Sixth Formers. However, they now wish to enforce a new 'dress code' on the students. Several points have been raised explaining why this is a bad idea, but the teachers will not listen to reason.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
